DOC.brief_summary: The aim study examine effect soy fiber body weight , body composition blood lipid overweight obese participant .
DOC.brief_title: Soy Fiber Improves Weight Loss Lipid Profile
DOC.detailed_description: Thirty nine overweight obese college adult ( 19-39 age ) randomly assign consume control biscuits biscuit supplement soy fiber 12 wk ( approximately 100g/d ) . Information body weight , body mass index , waist/hip circumference , blood pressure well measure lipoprotein , glucose concentration , HbA1c obtain baseline , 8 12 wk intervention . Body composition also assess baseline wk 12 , respectively .
